categories: Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Maurice LaMarche (born March 30, 1958) is a Canadian voice actor who voiced General Var Suthra, Lox, and The Wheezer in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
He also worked on the LucasArts game Full Throttle, as well as Star Warped, an interactive game parodying Star Wars.
